attributes.action: Force MP's to accept a pension on retirement equal to that of an average Private sector employee.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At a time when both public and private sector pensions are in crisis,MP's indulge themselves in above inflation increases to their pension entitlement,effectively isolating them from any of the future hardship which will affect many private sector employees.
   REMEMBER....MP's are employees of us,the British Taxpayer and are not MP's by right!
